author: Chris Thomason
comment: I really love this watch face. The backgrounds are nice. Updated to 5 stars for fixing the battery drain. Cannot stop looking at this beautiful watchface!

reply.author: Code My Brains Out
reply.content:
Dear Chris,

Thanks for your feedback. Please update your app to the latest version in which battery draining issue has been resolved.

Thanks

title: Pretty but

author: Evertson Croes
comment: Faces looks great, however battery drain is too much...even after "fix".
title: Battery drain

author: Holger Durer
comment: Nice watch faces but sucks watch battery like there is no tomorrow. Less than 8h on my old LG when others last almost 2 days.
I think Santa stuck in the chimney is my favorite. :)
title: Very cute watch faces

author: Decu Dragos Valentin
comment: Much better after snow animation was turned off. Now add an option to edit text font and this is perfect.

reply.author: Code My Brains Out
reply.content:
Dear Decu Dragos Valentin,

Thanks for your valuable feedback. The snow animation has been removed as it was causing too much battery drain. The option to make it optional will be added in the future updates of the app.

Thanks
Code My Brains Out

title: Much better

comment: Great Christmas watch faces. Also very responsive developer

reply.author: Code My Brains Out
reply.content:
Hey Brian,

Thanks for your feedback. We have updated the app with some UI improvements and optimized battery performance. Please update your app to the latest version.

Thanks
Code My Brains Out

Sorry for the inconvenience caused. If the watchface doesn't show up, try resyncing the apps on your Android wear device. If the problem still persists, contact us on codemybrainsout.help@gmail.com

Thanks
